trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SEQ_00<tab>Chora-Zoi is excited to begin improvements on the splendorous tools. ※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SEQ_01<tab>Chora-Zoi has been looking over Grenoldt's plans to improve the base splendorous tool, and could not be more excited to begin the process. Before augmenting anything, however, there is the small matter of preparing suitable trade goods...which can then be exchanged for the rare and expensive components procured by the Boutique of Splendors. This, according to Grenoldt, is to be your job. Once you are done trading wares to Quinnana, Chora-Zoi will be waiting to take charge of both materials and tool for the next step of this splendorous endeavor.
※Please note that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SEQ_02<tab>You entrust the splendorous tool and rare materials to Chora-Zoi, and, under Grenoldt's watchful eye, she succeeds in effecting the desired improvements. The already masterful piece feels somehow more natural in your hand─a testament to the young artisan's consummate skill. With the first stage complete, you look forward to how the next stage of improvements will transform your tool of the trade.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “A Dedicated Tool,” you will receive an upgraded splendorous tool for your current class of <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_A1_000_001<tab>Undertake this quest as another class.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_A1_000_002<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Be advised that once you have undertaken this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Please ensure that you have changed to your desired class before speaking with Chora-Zoi.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>In order to receive the quest “A Dedicated Tool,” you must have <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_100_004<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different class and speak with Chora-Zoi again.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_007<tab>Master Grenoldt was just showing me the plans he drew up for augmenting the tool he gave you...

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_008<tab>...And the concept is nothing short of incredible! It lays out, step by step, how we can gradually evolve a functionally complete instrument to an even higher level of perfection!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_009<tab>Aye, ye've grasped the idea just from lookin' at me diagrams. With instincts like that, I'd say yer ready to put hammer to anvil!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_010<tab>I am...? I mean, yes, sir! R-Ready and willing!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_011<tab>First things first, we get our supplies sorted out. The Boutique has promised to acquire the materials we need, but uncommon wares demand uncommon payment.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_012<tab>So I'm volunteerin' yer services, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Yer job is to come up with quality trade goods for barter, an' I want ye to do that by usin' the tool we're tryin' to improve.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_013<tab>The more a skilled <var 08 E905 ((tradeswoman)) ((tradesman)) /var> puts it to work, the more we can see what bits need shorin' up─an' the better we can judge if our planned improvements are on the right track.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_015<tab>Come to think of it, I should be shoring up my forging technique... I wouldn't want to ruin any of those rare materials!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_016<tab>Aye, that's the mindset to have, lass. Dignity and dedication─that'll be our motto from now on. To work, then!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_017<tab>Keen to help us make another splendorous tool?
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_018<tab>Ahem, right, so... For this particular project, the plans call for a supply of <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var>.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_100_018<tab>According to Master Grenoldt's notations, the Boutique will trade us those materials in exchange for <var 08 E4E80202 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297640302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80203 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297650302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80204 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297660302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80205 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297670302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297680302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80207 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297690302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80208 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2976A0302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80209 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2976B0302 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> made by a master artisan─you!

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_020<tab>Oh, and as we discussed earlier, it's very important that you craft the trade goods using the base splendorous tool so we can gauge the best path for its augmentation!

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_021<tab>Go ahead and deliver your wares directly to Quinnana, and she should part with some of her stock of splendorous components. Any questions? Please direct them to Master Grenoldt!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_019<tab>Ahem, right, so... For this particular project, the plans call for a supply of <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var>.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_100_019<tab>According to Master Grenoldt's notations, the Boutique will trade us <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> in exchange for <var 08 E4E8030A ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297860302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8030B ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F297840302 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> procured by a master gatherer─you!

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_100_020<tab>Oh, and as we discussed earlier, it's very important that you gather the trade goods using the base splendorous tool so we can gauge the best path for its augmentation!

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_100_021<tab>Go ahead and deliver your wares directly to Quinnana, and she should part with some of her stock of splendorous components. Any questions? Please direct them to Master Grenoldt!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_200_019<tab>Ahem, right, so... For this particular project, the plans call for a supply of <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var>.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_300_019<tab>According to Master Grenoldt's notations, the Boutique will trade us what we need in exchange for <var 31 ((Item)) 04F297880302 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 04F297890302 /var> procured by a master fisher─you!

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_200_020<tab>Oh, and as we discussed earlier, it's very important that you fish for the trade goods using the base splendorous tool so we can gauge the best path for its augmentation!

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_200_021<tab>Go ahead and deliver your wares directly to Quinnana, and she should part with some of her stock of splendorous components. Any questions? Please direct them to Master Grenoldt!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Present Chora-Zoi with your splendorous tool and the requisite materials to receive an upgraded version.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>Splendorous components can be obtained by delivering selected trade goods to Quinnana at Grenoldt's workbench near the Crystalline Mean.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>To craft the necessary trade goods, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sidequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate applicable recipes.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>Please note that select crafting materials can be purchased with scrips, and that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when crafting.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>The trade goods in question can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gathering Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>Please note that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when gathering.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_028<tab>Catching fish suitable for use as trade goods requires the use of specialized bait balls. This bait can be obtained from Quinnana in exchange for scrips.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>Furthermore, please note that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when fishing.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>When making your final delivery to Chora-Zoi, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_031<tab>Summat confusin' ye? Just make sure to use the base splendorous tool to prepare the trade goods for barter.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_032<tab>Deliver said goods to Quinnana, an' she'll exchange them for the rare materials we need. Once ye've got enough, drop the lot on Chora-Zoi so's she can get on with the improvements. Simple, eh?
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Present Chora-Zoi with your splendorous tool and the requisite materials to receive an upgraded version.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>Splendorous components can be obtained by delivering selected trade goods to Quinnana at Grenoldt's workbench near the Crystalline Mean.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>To craft the necessary trade goods, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sidequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate applicable recipes.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>Please note that select crafting materials can be purchased with scrips, and that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when crafting.

TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_038<tab>The trade goods in question can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gathering Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>Please note that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when gathering.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Catching fish suitable for use as trade goods requires the use of specialized bait balls. This bait can be obtained from Quinnana in exchange for scrips.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Furthermore, please note that you must have your splendorous tool equipped when fishing.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>When making your final delivery to Chora-Zoi, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_050<tab>That's quite a pile of components you have there! If you could just sort of...drop them into my arms here. Oh, and the tool, of course!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_051<tab>So many precious materials... I'll do my best to make the most of them!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_052<tab>Aye, Mistress Mowen an' <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> have done their part─time for us to do ours.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_053<tab>To the Facet of Forging we go! If you don't mind waiting, this shouldn't take too terribly long!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_054<tab>All finished! I was a bit nervous handling those rare components...
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_055<tab>...But I just followed Master Grenoldt's diagrams and I think I was able to make some definite improvements!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_GRENOLDT_000_056<tab>She's got a good eye an' a steady hand, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I reckon ye'll be pleased with how it turned out.
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_057<tab>I think I'm getting the hang of this! With every new tool I improve, I feel like I'm improving myself along the way!
TEXT_AKTKCT102_04731_CHORAZOI_000_058<tab>May I present to you <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>! Go on─hold it up for the world to see!
